subject: Athletics and Sports
Stadiums and Arenas
Soccer
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Jeff Wilpon, the Mets’ chief operating officer, said he talked to the Islanders  owner Charles Wang about building an arena near Citi Field and possibly buying the money-losing Islanders.
snippet: Jeff Wilpon, the Mets’ chief operating officer, said he talked to the Islanders  owner Charles Wang about building an arena near Citi Field and possibly buying the money-losing Islanders.
